text: A vector graphics editor is a computer program that lets users make and change vector graphics images and save them in one of many popular vector graphics formats such as EPS, PDF, WMF, SVG or VML. ==Related pages== *Graphics *Editing digital images == Other websites == *Inkscape - Popular open source Vector graphics editor *Vector Magic - Precision Bitmap to Vector Conversion Online *Math Games: Vector vs Raster (maa.org) - A list of 65 vector graphics editors. *Bitmap And Vector Graphics Explained Category:Graphics software
title: Vector graphics editor
